title: 02/02/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 02/02/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's episode of the Dan Patrick Show, we're joined by Melissa Etheridge, who debuts her new Chiefs song. We're also joined by Former NFL OT Matt Light, who makes his choice between Brady and Belichick. Rounding out today's guests are NFL Hall of Fame RB Barry Sanders and USA Today sports handicapper Danny Sheridan.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On Today's episode of the Dan Patrick Show, we're joined by Melissa Etheridge, who debuts her new Chiefs song. We're also joined by Former NFL OT Matt Light, who makes his choice between Brady and Belichick. Rounding out today's guests are NFL Hall of Fame RB Barry Sanders and USA Today sports handicapper Danny Sheridan.
